LanguageData.ArachnaeBeast_Race_Slayer.label: Arachne massacres the species
LanguageData.ArachnaeBeast_Race_Slayer.description: One of the Arachne Beast Bugs, it is tall and covered with thick carapace. Its huge feet trample the surrounding enemies without distinction, and it has a pair of thick sickle claws that can knock down a group of enemies. Its purpose of existence is to resist and absorb attacks, and crush the enemy's spearheads attacking the back row of the insect swarm.
LanguageData.ArachnaeBeast_Race_Slayer.comps.CompProp: Even the Arachne Beast Worm with its well-developed limbs and simple mind cannot escape the destined death engraved in its genes.
The body of this Arachne Zerg is so huge that any enemy that gets close to it will be directly trampled to death.
LanguageData.ArachnaeBeast_Race_Slayer.tools.0.label: sickle claw swipe
LanguageData.ARA_PawnBodyWeapon_Cleave.label: sickle claw swipe
